document.full_text: mexican security forces arrested 16 municipal police officers accused of protecting drug gang hitmen who massacred dozens of people near the u.s. border, the country's attorney general said on wednesday.
document.title: mexico nabs police accused of backing gang massacre
lines_and_colors: mexican security forces arrested 16 municipal police officers accused of protecting drug gang hitmen who massacred dozens of people near the u.s. border, the country's attorney general said on wednesday.
